nodes.text: Velvet was a soft and plush fabric that was a symbol of wealth and privilege. Garments made of embroidered velvet and silk were a common sight at the balls and receptions held in the Imperial Palace of Coruscant. Both Finis Valorum and Sheev Palpatine sometimes wore velvet overcloaks during their respective terms as Supreme Chancellor of the Galactic Republic. During her pregnancy, senator Padmé Amidala sometimes wore a green velvet dress displaying patterns of House Bonteri. During his time as senator of Riosa in the New Republic's Galactic Senate, Ransolm Casterfo often wore velvet cloaks and robes.
